attrs.name: dialog-title
attrs.desc: Set the title of the file upload dialog box. The default value is file upload

attrs.name: submit-button-text
attrs.desc: Set the text of the Submit button in the file upload dialog box. The default value is Start uploading

attrs.name: cancel-button-text
attrs.desc: Set the text of the Cancel button in the file upload dialog box. The default value is Cancel

attrs.name: action
attrs.desc: This parameter is mandatory and specifies the upload address.

attrs.name: limit
attrs.desc: Maximum number of files that can be uploaded

attrs.name: multiple
attrs.desc: Specifies whether multiple files can be selected.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Whether to disable; The default value is false

attrs.name: upload-file-type
attrs.desc: Type of the uploaded file to be verified, for example, ['.png', '.jpg']

attrs.name: max-upload-file-size
attrs.desc: Maximum size of files to be uploaded

attrs.name: upload-name
attrs.desc: Field name of the uploaded file
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is file.

attrs.name: upload-button-text
attrs.desc: Text configuration attribute of the button for opening a dialog box
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is Select File.

attrs.name: with-credentials
attrs.desc: Cookie credential information can be sent.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: before-remove
attrs.desc: This event is triggered before the upload file list is deleted successfully. arg1:{Information about the file to be deleted by clicking Object}

attrs.name: before-upload
attrs.desc: Hook before uploading a file. The parameter is the file to be uploaded. If false is returned or Promise is returned and rejected, the upload stops. ;arg1:{Object uploaded file information}

attrs.name: http-request
attrs.desc: Overwrite the default upload behavior. You can customize the upload implementation.
